name: Size Matters (itch) (~ POMPY Productions ~)
description:
Important note: I couldn't finish it in time because of a very busy schedule, so it's still a work-in-progress release. Nonetheless, I still wanted to submit it, for many reasons.

You can only walk around, interact with the birds, and not much more really. Press ESC to reach a main menu that has, basically, nothing going for it.

To consume or not to consume.

A rock that, by a twist of fate, gained consciousness. Will it kill? Will it eat? No one knows. Size Matters is a game, made for #GoGodotJam, where your decisions will lead you to different endings.

It is my first game jam entry. 

Because of my busy schedule, the game seriously fell behind. But my goal doesn't change: make it gorgeous. I want the experience to feel good, even if you're not doing anything. My hope is to prove one thing: Godot is not just functional, it can also be beautiful. 

Please let me know what you think!
